    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"

>
[Svetocher](/Feats.aspx?ID=5714) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=641" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You were born to a [moroi](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=480), the most common vampires, and you share their supernatural fortitude and power of persuasion. When you have the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) condition, calculate the penalty to your Fortitude saves and your Hit Point reduction as though the condition value were 1 lower. You're trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39). If you would automatically be trained in it, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.
name: Svetocher
